title: ChampionShip Thresh or Championship Shyvana?
body: Hello guys i just wanted to ask some people who would they rather pick Championship Thresh or ChampionShip Shyvana! I really need to know because i want to buy a skin but just asking in your opinion which one is better :3 thanks for reading this!{{champion:412}} {{champion:102}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I personally prefer the thresh skin over shyv.

Both are very nice so my only real suggestion is to buy the skin for the champion you play the most out of the two. 

I could provide a breakdown of the two, but there's already one here for [Thresh](http://www.strategyzero.com/blog/2013/league-of-legends-thresh-skins-review/) and one here for [Shyvana.](http://www.strategyzero.com/blog/2012/league-of-legends-shyvana-skins-review/)

Happy skinning :3
Thank you so much for your opinion :D
